title: Integrated continuous-variable quantum light resource for quantum information
author: Xifeng Ren, Guangcan Guo
summary: The article comments on a comprehensive review of integrated continuous-variable quantum light sources, high lighting its structured synthesis of recent advances and its relevance to scalable CV quantum computing.
title_cn: 用于量子信息的集成连续可变量子光源
abstract_cn: 文章对集成连续可变量子光源进行了全面回顾，重点介绍了其最新进展的结构化综合及其与可扩展的 CV 量子计算的相关性。
